title: Sangoshou no Kioku
description: is an album containing BGM tracks and insert songs from the first part of the Nijigasaki High School Idol Club movie triology. It also contains partial solo versions of Doko ni Itemo Kimi wa Kimi.

infobox.Image: Nijigasaki The Movie Final Chapter Part 1 OST Sangoshou no Kioku.jpg
infobox.Artist: Naoki Endo & Nijigasaki High School Idol Club
infobox.Label: Lantis
